title: Mnomia's World
description: Mnomia's World is an intellectual look at time travel that will draw you in to parallel worlds of science.In the future, time travel emerges and Mnomia becomes a Lord of the Obelisks. She falls in love and introduces her man into the Obelisk's Time Consortium. Lost in a myriad of time changes, Mnomia is sent to Earth to salvage her lover's very soul."Every soul has a unique experience of life. Each soul experiences its own universe. Everyone controls their own destiny."
author: James Halon
